availableFields.description: This is the cost of the product excluding the costs of its options.
availableFields.label: Base Cost
availableFields.name: Product_BaseCost

availableFields.description: This is the selling price of one instance of this product, excluding options, but including discounts and charges directly associated with this product.
availableFields.label: Base Selling Price
availableFields.name: BaseSellingPrice

availableFields.description: This is the time when this object was created.
availableFields.label: Created
availableFields.name: CreatedDate

availableFields.description: This is the ID of the user who created this object.
availableFields.label: Created By
availableFields.name: CreatedById

availableFields.description: If this record is a configured product, this is the date of the configuration database that was used to create it. If this record is a special product it is null.
availableFields.label: Data Set
availableFields.name: Product_ConfigDatabaseDate

availableFields.description: This is the description of the quote line.
availableFields.label: Description
availableFields.name: Description

availableFields.description: This is the extended description for the product.
availableFields.label: Extended Description
availableFields.name: ExtendedDescription

availableFields.description: This field tells if this quote line is included in quote totals.
availableFields.label: Included
availableFields.name: IsSelected

availableFields.description: This is the time when this object was last modified.
availableFields.label: Last Modified
availableFields.name: LastModifiedDate

availableFields.description: This is the ID of the user who last modified this object.
availableFields.label: Last Modified By
availableFields.name: LastModifiedById

availableFields.description: This is the base list price of one instance of this product, excluding options.
availableFields.label: List Price
availableFields.name: BaseListPrice

availableFields.description: This is the name of the quote line.
availableFields.label: Name
availableFields.name: Name

availableFields.description: This is the total selling price for any nested products attached to this line.
availableFields.label: Nested Selling Price
availableFields.name: NestedProductsSellingPrice

availableFields.description: This is the total of the cost of the product after applying charge and discount costs
availableFields.label: Options Cost
availableFields.name: OptionsCost

availableFields.description: This is the selling price of all the options selected with this product.
availableFields.label: Options List Price
availableFields.name: OptionsListPrice

availableFields.description: This is the gross profit margin for the quote. This is calculated as the OptionsProfit divided by the OptionsSellingPrice.
availableFields.label: Options Margin %
availableFields.name: OptionsMargin

availableFields.description: This is the total profit for the product. This is total selling price less total cost
availableFields.label: Options Profit
availableFields.name: OptionsProfit

availableFields.description: This is the selling price of all the options selected with this product, including discounts and charges directly associated with those options.
availableFields.label: Options Selling Price
availableFields.name: OptionsSellingPrice

availableFields.description: This is the order code for the product associated with this quote line.
availableFields.label: Order #
availableFields.name: OrderCode

availableFields.description: This is the quantity of the product for this quote line.
availableFields.label: Qty
availableFields.name: Quantity

availableFields.description: This is the BaseSellingPrice times the quantity.
availableFields.label: Total Base Selling Price
availableFields.name: TotalBaseSellingPrice

availableFields.description: This is the total of the cost of the product with its options after applying charge and discount costs
availableFields.label: Total Cost
availableFields.name: TotalCost

availableFields.description: This is the gross profit margin for the quote line. This is calculated as the TotalProfit divided by the TotalSellingPrice.
availableFields.label: Total Margin %
availableFields.name: TotalMargin

availableFields.description: This is the total profit for the product. This is total selling price less total cost
availableFields.label: Total Profit
availableFields.name: TotalProfit

availableFields.description: This is the total selling price of this line, which is the unit selling price multiplied by the quantity.
availableFields.label: Total Selling Price
availableFields.name: TotalSellingPrice

availableFields.description: This is the list price of one instance of this product, which includes options.
availableFields.label: Unit List Price
availableFields.name: UnitListPrice

availableFields.description: This is the selling price of one instance of this product, which includes options, discounts and charges for that product and its options.
availableFields.label: Unit Selling Price
availableFields.name: UnitSellingPrice

listLayoutFields.description: This is the quantity of the product for this quote line.
listLayoutFields.label: Qty
listLayoutFields.name: Quantity

listLayoutFields.description: This is the name of the quote line.
listLayoutFields.label: Name
listLayoutFields.name: Name

listLayoutFields.description: This is the order code for the product associated with this quote line.
listLayoutFields.label: Order #
listLayoutFields.name: OrderCode

listLayoutFields.description: This is the base list price of one instance of this product, excluding options.
listLayoutFields.label: List Price
listLayoutFields.name: BaseListPrice
